summary: Adds a new housing complex to skyrim with hand crafted hills and mountains and 1 months work on a house.
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=5]Welcome to Mountain Crest![/size][/center][br]

[center][youtube]n6lbaFzL4uc[/youtube][/center]

[center][youtube]pPFw1y7tqWs[/youtube][/center]

[center][youtube]6d3qwGtBy6Q[/youtube][/center]

[color=red]MY ENB MOD[/color]
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19002


This house mod i have worked on the past 1 month is a mountain top villa based around a forest, it has been a huge struggle to work with and i have put my whole imagination into this peice.

Questline will be introduced shortly with a narritive a compelling story behind the house, and maybe a companion or two for completion!

Lets begin with the features.

[color=red]VIDEO[/color]
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ni7BoA4D6yo

[color=red]FEATURES[/color]

-Completely hand crafted mountain top and house for pleasure and comfort
-Idividualy placed plants/flora/woodwork and streams for a imaginative and lore friendly feel.
-Co-hosted and supplied feedback from SaioTV.
-Optimisation in mind!
-ENB in mind!
-Blacksmithy with grindstone/tanning rack and smelter, more to come!
-Huge indoors to suit the outside area featuring amazing detailed lighting and well placed objects for route traverse.
-Lookout tower for views just to the side of the manor
-Bedroom suite with storage
-Bookshelfs and mannuiqines are in now!
-Treasury for all your storage needs.
-DOF included into the house with custom dust particles!
-Stunning views and a amazing place to behold
-Updates everyday!
-Special nexus edition includes!, New spa and stables and various improvements to the house!.
[color=red]CHANGELOG[/color]
V1.1 fixed some issues and added mannequins and more detail
V1.15 Added improvments to enb looks. this mainly includes SuperB enb (no download required for this update)
V1.2 Added alchemy and echanting room at the bottom of the stairs, and adjusted and added objects. (example) more flora in the bedroom.
V1.21 Fixed backdoor spawn and chest names as requested
V1.22 Added bookcases and hopefully fixed whiterun issue
V1.25 Added basic garden layout, fixed steal issues.
V1.25.1 Fixed shadow stripes in treasury
V1.3 prep, Preparing file for upgrade such as requested spa and archery range. also added little details and some optimisation.
V1.31 Added Spa just outside the cabin
[color=red]THANKS LIST[/color]
SaioTV 

Sneakyman Tim

Lilbrostout

[color=blue]SCREENSHOTS BY COUNTERCRUEL AND VIDEO BY SAIOTV[/color]

=====Thumbnail and video by SaioTV=====


For unlisting in skyrim please disable Morninghood Manor (old name)
author: Countercruel
